title: Color Palette

title: Nasa

ariaLabel: Open Nasa project: space site displaying the Astronomical Image of the Day with a daily astronomer explanation

title: Free Games
description: Free Games is a web application that provides a list of free games available on the Epic Games Store. It allows users to view game details, including images, descriptions, and links to the Epic Games Store.

ariaLabel: Open Free Games project: a site to view free games and their details

title: Caesar-Cipher
description: Caesar-Cipher is a web tool that encrypts and decrypts text using Caesar cipher, ideal for learning basic cryptography with a simple and accessible interface.

ariaLabel: Open Caesar-Cipher project: encrypt and decrypt text using the Caesar cipher

title: Random Color Generation
